name: Galleria Mall Outpatient Clinic
description: The Nairobi Hospital Outpatient Clinic at Galleria Mall is part of the renowned Nairobi Hospital's network of healthcare facilities, offering high-quality medical services in a more accessible and convenient location for residents and visitors of the area. The outpatient clinic at Galleria is designed to provide a wide range of healthcare services for those who don’t require hospitalization but need medical consultations, diagnostics, and follow-up care. Galleria Mall clinic opens daily from 7am-7pm. With fully operational dispensing pharmacies, laboratory, X-ray, CT Scan and ultrasound.

item-1.title: DENTAL SERVICES
item-1.Subject: Monday, Wednesday, Friday: 8am-4pm Alternate Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday: 8am-4pm (on booking)

item-3.title: ANTENATAL CLINIC, POSTNATAL & B GYNAECOLOGY CLINIC
item-3.Subject: Tuesdays, Wednesdays & Thursday: 9:00am -1:00pm

item-9.title: PAEDITRIC CLINICS
item-9.Subject:
Mondays 8.00am-2.00pm (General paeditrics & Paediatrics infectious diseases).
Tuesdays 9:00am-2:00pm
Wednesday-Friday 10.00am to 3.00pm
Saturdays: 11:00am - 3.00pm (General paediatrics & Paediatrics endocrinology)
